name: Lost on the Flip-Side
description:
I was super busy with college exams during this game jam, so I wasn't able to add audio and fully complete this game as I planned, sadly.

This game marks the third game in the Xesiverse with the other two being, "Lost in the Shadows" and "The Shadowed Dungeons" which were also Brackey's Game Jam games and made by me, MacJCoding.

Controls

  • Space - Continue dialogue
  • A  - Move Left 
  • D - Move Right
  • W - Jump
  • R - Reset/Restart
  • Left-Click - Add Ruby
  • Right-Click - Add Stone
  • Left Shift - Exit Editing Mode
  • Escape - Return to menu (ALL PROGRESS WILL RESET)
